title: Android 11 update, restore google search to square/overview button
content: I just updated to Android 11 on a pixel 2xl and now the google search bar has been removed and changed to other functions when I hit the square/overview button. Is there anyway to restore this function? I like to be able to s scroll through my open apps to get information for my search.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
